name: Particles Of Light
description:
Particles of Light is a classic speed platformer.

You are a sentient body of light particles, the only light is a completely dark world. Discover the secrets of the world as you climb to reach the portal which will hopefully take you home.

Make it to the end of each level as fast as you can. Discover new terrain as your light uncovers it. Avoid saw, suppression systems and shots of anti-energy.
